fields.name: company_name
fields.description: Full legal name of the company (e.g. Acme Corp, Inc.)

fields.name: investor_name
fields.description: Full legal name of the lead investor

fields.name: key_holder_name
fields.description: Full name of the key holder (founder or executive)

fields.name: company_counsel
fields.description: Name and address of company's legal counsel

fields.name: counsel_cc
fields.description: Additional counsel to CC on notices, or empty string if none

fields.name: amended_restated_upper
fields.description: Uppercase prefix if amending a prior agreement (e.g. AMENDED AND RESTATED) or empty string

fields.name: amended_restated
fields.description: Title-case prefix if amending a prior agreement (e.g. Amended and Restated) or empty string

fields.name: judicial_district
fields.description: Federal judicial district for dispute resolution (e.g. District of Delaware)

fields.name: state_lower
fields.description: State of incorporation in lowercase (e.g. delaware)

fields.name: business_description
fields.description: Brief description of the company's business

fields.name: effective_date
fields.description: Effective date of the agreement (e.g. January 15, 2025)

fields.name: specify_percentage
fields.description: Specified percentage threshold for key holder transfers

fields.name: rofr_response_days
fields.description: Number of days for the company and investors to respond to a ROFR notice (default 45)

fields.name: key_holders_label
fields.description: Label for the key holders group (e.g. Key Holders or Founders)
